728357f-c.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Clarke Avenue
728357f-c.text:
(1)
135 Arthur Kill Road, north side, west of
Clarke Avenue, showing the former home of C.M. Conner
(Conngr) and the automobile graveyard of the Richmond
Auto Wrecking Company.
May 5, 1929
P. L. Sperr
NO REFRODUCTIONS
(2)
The same, another and more extensive view.
May 5, 1929
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODU)TIONS
(3)
The same, at a later date. Note the house
having been remodeled.
May 9, 1935
P. L. Sperr
NO REFRODUCTIONS
728357f-c.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Clarke Avenue, Staten Island, NY

728356f-b.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Clarke Avenue
728356f-b.text:
135 Arthur Kill Road, north side, west of
Clarke Avenue, showing the auto wrecking place of the
Richmond Auto Wrecking Company. It is situated on the
former C.M. Connor (Conner) property.
May 9, 1935
Views 1, 2
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
